roleInfo:
```![customrole|role|cr]

Mods can add roles, users can apply or relieve roles. Roles created with this bot have no permissions, it only functions for fun.

Commands:
  apply   Apply a role
  list    List all available roles
  relieve Relieve a role

Type !role command for more info on a command. You can also type !role category for more info on a category.```
